name: random integer
content:
Gets a random integer within the range of the specified minimum and maximum numbers.

This block can be used in place of any number. It works well for generating a random integer. For example, it can be used to randomize a spriteâ€™s property or location.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: Make a sprite of a random size.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: The results of the race will change every time the project is run because the car and motorcycle will move a random number of pixels north each time the up arrow is pressed.

tips:
- Negative values for min or max are allowed.
- If you accidentally make min larger than max it will still return a random number in the range.
